title.newValue: Microsoft Teams: Automatically view up to 49 videos (7x7) in Teams meeting

description.newValue:
Microsoft Teams Meetings currently supports a maximum of 9 videos (3x3) on the screen by default (i.e., Gallery view). For seeing more than 9 videos, user needs to manually select the Large Gallery view. With this update, users will be able to automatically see up to 49 videos (7x7) on their screen by default without an explicit action. The actual number of videos seen by a user will depend on hardware/device capabilities.
GA date: September CY2022
